experience: You and Sam both know Robert  A. Pasionek, Bart Rupert, and 11 others
Independent Agency Sales Alert – September 2017 Edition
Who Should You Sell Your Insurance Agency To?
Springtree Group -- Serving the Agent & Brokerage Community

A Business Services consulting concern focused on Agent, Brokerage and related administration space. Specialized firm with a high level of financial services, M&A, organizational integration  and operational management expertise. Based in Dallas, Texas.

Apex Global Partners was a leading independent mixed practice international insurance broker providing a full range of risk management, employee benefits and financial services products and services catering to middle market businesses. Based in Dallas, Apex had partner offices in 56 foreign countries.

USI is one of the worlds largest private diversified insurance and financial services firms focused on a technology enabled, fully integrated delivery of insurance, financial services and consulting services.

United Healthcare, a public Fortune 100 company, is the second largest provider of health and well-being services in the USA. United Healthcare is a pioneer in the marriage of technology, data and health care delivery.

MaxSol developed packaged software solutions to assist insurance companies in Web enabling disparate and distributed backend databases. The core technology and application suites focused on solving e-sales & service opportunities.

recommendations: Bill Friend
Premium Financing Specialist - 866-374-3630
December 30, 2013, Bill worked with Sam but at different companies

Sam & I have worked together for a few years now.  Premium Finance works with insurance agents in financing insured's premium whereas Springtree Group performs mergers and acquisitions.  Our backgrounds meld together nicely in that we bring insurance agents to Sam to underwrite loans for acquisition, perpetuation and capitalization.  Sam is responsive and motivated as we have closed multiple loans for insurance agents throughout the United States.  I highly recommend Sam as a business professional.

summary: Professional experience follows a distinct focus in C-level management responsibilities with F-50 companies and significant entrepreneurial settings in the insurance services space. Dominate professional experience in the B2B insurance and related organizations. Core strength is financial restructuring, M&A activities and revenue development. Verified success with acquisitons, mergers, integrations, turnarounds, brand building, organizational reengineering, and resolving management hot spots.Specialties: Insurance and related organizations
name: Sam Patterson
